articles.author: Albert Breer
articles.title: How Dez Bryant's COVID-19 Situation Played Out and Why Ravens-Cowboys Went On - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The NFL faced a new situation, learning about Dez Bryant's positive test while he was warming up for a game. Here's how the NFL and the Ravens handled it.
articles.content: The Baltimore staff was buzzing on the field pregame when some fairly stunning news came back. It was news that, even by 2020 standards, qualified as unprecedented. The immediate reaction from the co… [+16844 chars]
